title: COMP/STAT112 Notebook
text:
Introduction
This is my online notebook for COMP/STAT112 course taken at Macalester College. Please, use the side bar on the left for navigation.

title: 3  Activity 03
text:
3.1 Adds the actual data
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar()

title: 3  Activity 03
section: 3.2 Adds the names of the x-axis and y-axis
text:
3.2 Adds the names of the x-axis and y-axis
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar() + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”)

title: 3  Activity 03
section: 3.3 Changes the color of the bars to blue
text:
3.3 Changes the color of the bars to blue
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar(fill = “blue”) + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”)

title: 3  Activity 03
section: 3.4 Changes the color of the outline of the bars
text:
3.4 Changes the color of the outline of the bars
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar(color = “orange”, fill = “blue”) + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”)

title: 3  Activity 03
section: 3.5 removes gray outline and exchnages it with white
text:
3.5 removes gray outline and exchnages it with white
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar(color = “orange”, fill = “blue”) + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”) + theme_minimal()
